title: Reference %name% variable/field in hostname field
author: penguinairlines
body_snippet:
new feature/enhancement request

Use-case:
Often I am using the fqdn, or dns name, in order to craft a new session. I use the hostname, possibly with the subdomain, as the name (name: hostname.dev) in most cases. Today I thought "gee, it would be swell if I could use a variable to reference the connection name as part of the hostname, because then I could inherit that too and only modify a single field when duplicating to make a new connection!"

iterations.description: Implemented variable expansion for the hostname field to support dynamic connection names like %name% using a new ConnectionInfoVariableExpander.
